ColumnA: Intensive phase: applies to 4- and 6-month regimens
ColumnC: Continue treatment and complete all intensive phase doses

ColumnA: Intensive phase: applies to 4- and 6-month regimens

ColumnB: Completed <80% of doses and cumulative interruption <1 month
Completed <80% of doses and cumulative interruption >1 month
ColumnC: Restart treatment from beginning of intensive phase

ColumnA: Continuation phase (6-month 2HRZE/4HR regimen) and bacteriologically negative at initiation
Continuation phase (6-month 2HRZE/4HR regimen) and bacteriologically positive at initiation
ColumnC: Complete remaining doses of treatment If consecutive lapse is >2 months, use clinical judgement

ColumnB: Completed <80% of doses and cumulative interruption <2 months
Completed <80% of doses and cumulative interruption ≥2 months
ColumnC: Restart treatment from beginning of intensive phase, particularly if interruption was consecutive
